instruction.en:
Double press the reset button.

If pairing does not start after 20 seconds, reset the device by press and hold reset button for over 5 seconds.

Inclusion, Exclusion 
Triple press the reset button on the dimmer. 

!!! NOTE 
Wait 5 - 10 seconds after each pairing operation, otherwise pairing will easily fail. 

Factory reset 
Press and hold down the reset button for over 5 seconds.

hint.en:
The ASSIC of Lifeline: 4C 69 66 65 6C 69 6E 65. 
1. When press and hold down reset button over 5s to reset the dimmer send Device Reset Locally Notification CC to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information. 
2. When load state changes send Switch Multilevel Report CC to associated devices of this group.

Basic Set: 42 61 73 69 63 20 53 65 74. 
1. Short press Knob turn on the dimmer sends Basic Set (0xFF) to associated devices. 
2. Short press Knob turn off the dimmer sends Basic Set (0x00) to associated devices.

Switch Multilevel: 53 77 69 74 63 68 20 4D 75 6C 74 69 6C 65 76 65 6C. 
1. Turn knob to the left sends Switch Multilevel Set (to keep associated devices in sync with this device) to associated devices. 
2. Turn knob to the right sends Switch Multilevel Set (to keep associated devices in sync with this device) to associated devices.

External Button: 45 78 74 65 72 6E 61 6C 20 42 75 74 74 6F 6E. 
1. External button hold send Switch Multilevel Start Level Change (Switchover dimmer Up/Down). 
2. External button release send Switch Multilevel Stop Level Change.
This parameter (5) determines the option to use an external switch to include or exclude the device from the network. Default: Disabled
hint.nl: Deze parameter (5) schakelt de optie in om een externe schakelaar te gebruiken om de dimmer toe te voegen of te verwijderen uit het netwerk.

hint.en: This parameter (3) determines the default dim duration. Values: 0 - 100. 0: Instantly. 100: Slow. Default: 5

Settings delay time when turn off the load, unit is second.
Valid value: 0-60
This parameter (6) determines if the dimmer uses linear or logarithmic dimming.
This parameter (7) determines the default brightness when turned on. 0: Dimmer will use state after power is restored (parameter 1). Values: 0 - 99. Default: 0
This parameter (1) determines whether after a power failure the device should be restored to the state it had before the power failure.
hint.nl: Deze parameter (1) bepaalt of het apparaat na een stroomonderbreking moet worden ingesteld zoals deze voor de stroomonderbreking stond ingesteld.

hint.en: This parameter (2) determines whether the `BASIC report` is sent to the Lifeline when the load state changed. Default: activated
hint.nl: Deze parameter (2) bepaalt of het `BASIC report` wordt verstuurd naar de controller wanneer de toestand van de dimmer verandert. Standaard: ingeschakeld

instruction.en:
Toggle the light from Off to On. 

If pairing does not start after 20 seconds, reset the the device by turning it off and on 6 times with 0.5-2 second intervals.

Toggle the light from Off to On. 

If pairing does not start after 20 seconds, reset the the device by turning it off and on 6 times with 0.5-2 second intervals.

Toggle the light from Off to On. 

If pairing does not start after 20 seconds, reset the the device by turning it off and on 6 times with 0.5-2 second intervals.

Toggle the light from Off to On. 

If pairing does not start after 20 seconds, reset the the device by turning it off and on 6 times with 0.5-2 second intervals.

Toggle the light from Off to On. 

If pairing does not start after 20 seconds, reset the the device by turning it off and on 6 times with 0.5-2 second intervals.

Toggle the light from Off to On. 

If pairing does not start after 20 seconds, reset the the device by turning it off and on 6 times with 0.5-2 second intervals.

Toggle the light from Off to On. 

If pairing does not start after 20 seconds, reset the the device by turning it off and on 6 times with 0.5-2 second intervals.

Toggle the light from Off to On. 

If pairing does not start after 20 seconds, reset the the device by turning it off and on 6 times with 0.5-2 second intervals.

Toggle the light from Off to On. 

If pairing does not start after 20 seconds, reset the the device by turning it off and on 6 times with 0.5-2 second intervals.

Toggle the light from Off to On. 

If pairing does not start after 20 seconds, reset the the device by turning it off and on 6 times with 0.5-2 second intervals.
Quickly press the Reset button on the device 5 times or repeatedly power OFF/ON 5 times to make the device into pair mode.

Press and hold down both buttons until LED indicator turns on, immediately short press pair button.

If pairing fails reset the device. Press and hold down both buttons until LED indicator turns on, immediately short press pair button 5 times quickly.

Press and hold down the Reset button until the LED indicator turns on. Release button immediately and press the Pair button.

If pairing does not start after 20 seconds, reset the device. Press the Reset button until the LED Indicator turn on. Release the button and immediately press the Reset button 5 times.

Press and hold down both Reset and Pair buttons until the LED indicator turns on. Release both button and immediately press the Pair button on the top right corner.

If pairing fails reset the device. Press and hold down both Reset and Pair buttons until the LED indicator turns on. Release both button and immediately press the Reset button 5 times.
Quickly press the Reset button on the device 5 times or repeatedly power OFF/ON 5 times to make the device into pair mode.

Press and hold down reset button until LED indicator turns on. Immediately short press pair button.

If pairing fails reset the device. Press and hold down reset button until LED indicator turns on. Immediately short press reset button 5 times quickly.

Press and hold down the Reset button until the LED indicator turns on. Release button immediately and press the Pair button.

If pairing does not start after 20 seconds, reset the device. Press the Reset button until the LED Indicator turn on. Release the button and immediately press the Reset button 5 times.
Quickly press the Reset button on the device 5 times or repeatedly power OFF/ON 5 times to make the device into pair mode.
Quickly press the Reset button on the device 5 times or repeatedly power OFF/ON 5 times to make the device into pair mode.
Quickly press the Reset button on the device 5 times or repeatedly power OFF/ON 5 times to make the device into pair mode.
Quickly press the Reset button on the device 5 times or repeatedly power OFF/ON 5 times to make the device into pair mode.

Press the Reset button 3 times quickly.

If pairing fails reset the device by pressing the Reset button for over 10 seconds.

Press and hold down both I and O buttons over 3 seconds.

If pairing fails reset the device by press and hold down both buttons I and O for over 10 seconds.

hint.en:
1. Send Command Class Device Reset Locally Notification V1 to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information when factory reset the remote control.
2. When remote control battery power value changes, send Command Class Battery Report V1 to associated devices of this group to report power value information.
3. Short press or press and hold down any button to send scene activation command to the associated devices of this group using Command Class Central Scene Notification V3

1. Short press / button of Group 2 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
2. Press and hold down / button of Group 2 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.
3. Short press Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Activation Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.
4. Press and hold down Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Conf Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.

1. Short press / button of Group 3 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
2. Press and hold down / button of Group 3 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.
3. Short press Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Activation Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.
4. Press and hold down Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Conf Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.

1. Short press / button of Group 4 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
2. Press and hold down / button of Group 4 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.
3. Short press Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Activation Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.
4. Press and hold down Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Conf Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.

1. Short press / button of Group 5 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
2. Press and hold down / button of Group 5 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.
3. Short press Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Activation Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.
4. Press and hold down Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Conf Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.

instruction.en:
Press and hold down both buttons over 3 seconds.

If pairing fails reset the device by press and hold down both buttons for over 10 seconds.

hint.en:
1. Send Command Class Device Reset Locally Notification V1 to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information when factory reset the remote control.
2. When remote control battery power value changes, send Command Class Battery Report V1 to associated devices of this group to report power value information.
3. Short press or press and hold down any button to send scene activation command to the associated devices of this group using Command Class Central Scene Notification V3

Short press on/off button to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.

Press and hold down brightness button to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.

instruction.en:
Press and hold down both I and O buttons over 3 seconds.

If pairing is not started press and hold down both buttons I and O for over 10 seconds.

hint.en:
1. Send Command Class Device Reset Locally Notification V1 to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information when factory reset the remote control.
2. When remote control battery power value changes, send Command Class Battery Report V1 to associated devices of this group to report power value information.
3. Short press or press and hold down any button to send scene activation command to the associated devices of this group using Command Class Central Scene Notification V3

Short press I/O button of Group 2 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.

Press and hold down brightness buttons of Group 2 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.

instruction.en:
Press and hold down both I and O buttons over 3 seconds.

If pairing is not started press and hold down both buttons I and O for over 10 seconds.

hint.en:
1. Send Command Class Device Reset Locally Notification V1 to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information when factory reset the remote control.
2. When remote control battery power value changes, send Command Class Battery Report V1 to associated devices of this group to report power value information.
3. Short press or press and hold down any button to send scene activation command to the associated devices of this group using Command Class Central Scene Notification V3

Short press I/O button of Group 2 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
Press and hold down I/O button of Group 2 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.

Short press I/O button of Group 3 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
Press and hold down I/O button of Group 3 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.

Short press I/O button of Group 4 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
Press and hold down I/O button of Group 4 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.

Short press I/O button of Group 5 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
Press and hold down I/O button of Group 5 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.

instruction.en:
Press the Reset button 3 times quickly.

If pairing fails reset the device by pressing the Reset button for over 10 seconds.

hint.en: This parameter (7) determines the option to use an external switch to include or exclude the device from the network.
hint.nl: Deze parameter (7) schakelt de optie in om een externe schakelaar te gebruiken om de dimmer toe te voegen of te verwijderen uit het netwerk.

hint.en: This parameter (2) determines whether after a power failure the device should be restored to the state it had before the power failure.
hint.nl: Deze parameter (2) bepaalt of het apparaat na een stroomonderbreking moet worden ingesteld zoals deze voor de stroomonderbreking stond ingesteld.

hint.en: This parameter (3) determines whether the `BASIC report` is send to the Lifeline when the load state changed. Default: activated
hint.nl: Deze parameter (3) bepaalt of het `BASIC report` wordt verstuurd naar de controller wanneer de toestand van de dimmer verandert. Standaard: ingeschakeld

hint.en: This parameter (6) determines the used MOSFET driving type. Default: Leading edge
hint.nl: Deze parameter (6) bepaalt de gebruikte MOSFET driving type. Standaard: Fase aansnijding

instruction.en:
Press the action button 3 times.

If pairing fails reset the device by press and hold down action button for over 10 seconds.

hint.en:
1. When factory reset the sensor, send Device Reset Locally Notification CC to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information.
2. When the sensor state changes, send NOTIFICATION CC to associated devices of this group.
3. When the battery power is low, send BATTERY CC to associated devices of this group.
When the sensor is turned on/off, send BASIC_SET. It can be configured by configuration parameter 02 to send BASIC=0XFF(ON), BASIC=0X00(OFF) or disable this function.

instruction.en:
(Re)Power on the smart plug, it will be set into pair mode automatically. You can also press the action button on the smart plug 3 times.

If pairing fails reset the device by press and hold down action button for over 10 seconds.

hint.en:
1. Smart plug Factory Reset, send Command Class Device Reset Locally Notification CC to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information when factory reset the smart plug.

2. Smart plug overloads, send Command Class NOTIFICATION_REPORT CC to associated devices of this group to report overload information.

3. When smart plug state changes, send Command Class SWITCH_BINARY_REPORT CC to associated devices of this group to report state information.

4. METER_ REPORT

instruction.en:
Press and hold down both Reset and Pair buttons until the LED indicator turns on. Release both button and immediately press the Pair button on the top right corner.

If pairing fails reset the device. Press and hold down both Reset and Pair buttons until the LED indicator turns on. Release both button and immediately press the Reset button 5 times.

Press and hold down both I and O buttons over 3 seconds.

If pairing is not started press and hold down both buttons I and O for over 10 seconds.

hint.en:
1. Send Command Class Device Reset Locally Notification V1 to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information when factory reset the remote control.
2. When remote control battery power value changes, send Command Class Battery Report V1 to associated devices of this group to report power value information.
3. Short press or press and hold down any button to send scene activation command to the associated devices of this group using Command Class Central Scene Notification V3

Short press I/O button of Group 2 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
Press and hold down I/O button of Group 2 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.

Short press I/O button of Group 3 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
Press and hold down I/O button of Group 3 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.

instruction.en:
Press the Reset button 3 times quickly.

If pairing fails reset the device by pressing the Reset button for over 10 seconds.

(Re)Power on the smart plug, it will be set into pair mode automatically. You can also press the action button on the smart plug 3 times.

If pairing fails reset the device by press and hold down action button for over 10 seconds.

hint.en:
1. Smart plug Factory Reset, send Command Class "Device Reset Locally Notification CC" to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information when factory reset the smart plug.
2. Smart plug over current, over temperature, send Command Class "NOTIFICATION_REPORT CC" to associated devices of this group to report overload information.
3. When smart plug state changes, send Command Class "SWITCH_BINARY_REPORT CC" to associated devices of this group to report state information.
4. METER_REPORT
5. Send SENSOR_MULTILEVEL_REPORT to report temperature
6. Report when thermostat setpoint or mode changes

instruction.en: Press the knob 5 times quickly. Immediately after press and hold the knob for over 3 seconds.

Press and hold down both buttons until the LED indicator turns on. Immediately short press the Pair button.

If pairing is not started reset the device. Press and hold down both buttons until LED indicator turns on. Immediately press the Pair button 5 times quickly.

Press and hold down both Reset and Pair buttons until the LED indicator turns on. Release both button and immediately press the Pair button on the top right corner.

If pairing fails reset the device. Press and hold down both Reset and Pair buttons until the LED indicator turns on. Release both button and immediately press the Reset button 5 times.

Press the Reset button 3 times quickly.

If pairing fails reset the device by pressing the Reset button for over 10 seconds.

Turn the device to OFF mode first, then press and hold UP and DOWN buttons at the same time for over 5 seconds to enter Settings Menu. Short press UP and DOWN button to select ADD item, then short press button F.

If pairing fails reset the device by select Reset item, then short press button F.

hint.en:
1.Send Command Class DEVICE_RESET_LOCALLY_NOTIFICATION to associated devices of this group when factory reset the device.
2.Send Command Class THERMOSTAT_SETPOINT_REPORT, THERMOSTAT_MODE_REPORT, THERMOSTAT_OPERATING_STATE_REPORT to associated devices of this group When operation mode and temperature change.
3.Send Command Class NOTIFICATION_REPORT to associated devices of this group when over current, over heat detected
4.Send Command Class METER_REPORT to associated devices of this group to report metering parameters.

Transfer Command Class THERMOSTAT_SETPOINT_SET THERMOSTAT_MODE_SET
to control other temperature control devices when operation changes

instruction.en:
Press the Reset button 3 times quickly.

If pairing fails reset the device by pressing the Reset button for over 10 seconds.
Quickly press the Reset button on the device 5 times or repeatedly power OFF/ON 5 times to make the device into pair mode.

Press the Reset button 3 times quickly.

If pairing fails reset the device by pressing the Reset button for over 10 seconds.

Inclusion, Exclusion 
Triple press the reset button on the dimmer. 

!!! NOTE 
Wait 5 - 10 seconds after each pairing operation, otherwise pairing will easily fail. 

Factory reset 
Press and hold down the reset button for over 5 seconds.

hint.en:
The ASSIC of Lifeline: 4C 69 66 65 6C 69 6E 65. 
1. When press and hold down reset button over 5s to reset the dimmer send Device Reset Locally Notification CC to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information. 
2. When load state changes send Switch Multilevel Report CC to associated devices of this group.

Basic Set: 42 61 73 69 63 20 53 65 74. 
1. Short press Knob turn on the dimmer sends Basic Set (0xFF) to associated devices. 
2. Short press Knob turn off the dimmer sends Basic Set (0x00) to associated devices.

Switch Multilevel: 53 77 69 74 63 68 20 4D 75 6C 74 69 6C 65 76 65 6C. 
1. Turn knob to the left sends Switch Multilevel Set (to keep associated devices in sync with this device) to associated devices. 
2. Turn knob to the right sends Switch Multilevel Set (to keep associated devices in sync with this device) to associated devices.

External Button: 45 78 74 65 72 6E 61 6C 20 42 75 74 74 6F 6E. 
1. External button hold send Switch Multilevel Start Level Change (Switchover dimmer Up/Down). 
2. External button release send Switch Multilevel Stop Level Change.
This parameter (5) determines the option to use an external switch to include or exclude the device from the network. Default: Disabled
hint.nl: Deze parameter (5) schakelt de optie in om een externe schakelaar te gebruiken om de dimmer toe te voegen of te verwijderen uit het netwerk.

hint.en: This parameter (3) determines the default dim duration. Values: 0 - 100. 0: Instantly. 100: Slow. Default: 5

Settings delay time when turn off the load, unit is second.
Valid value: 0-60
This parameter (6) determines if the dimmer uses linear or logarithmic dimming.
This parameter (7) determines the default brightness when turned on. 0: Dimmer will use state after power is restored (parameter 1). Values: 0 - 99. Default: 0
This parameter (1) determines whether after a power failure the device should be restored to the state it had before the power failure.
hint.nl: Deze parameter (1) bepaalt of het apparaat na een stroomonderbreking moet worden ingesteld zoals deze voor de stroomonderbreking stond ingesteld.

hint.en: This parameter (2) determines whether the `BASIC report` is sent to the Lifeline when the load state changed. Default: activated
hint.nl: Deze parameter (2) bepaalt of het `BASIC report` wordt verstuurd naar de controller wanneer de toestand van de dimmer verandert. Standaard: ingeschakeld

instruction.en:
Press the Reset button 3 times quickly.

If pairing fails reset the device by pressing the Reset button for over 10 seconds.

hint.en: This parameter (7) determines the option to use an external switch to include or exclude the device from the network.
hint.nl: Deze parameter (7) schakelt de optie in om een externe schakelaar te gebruiken om de dimmer toe te voegen of te verwijderen uit het netwerk.

hint.en: This parameter (2) determines whether after a power failure the device should be restored to the state it had before the power failure.
hint.nl: Deze parameter (2) bepaalt of het apparaat na een stroomonderbreking moet worden ingesteld zoals deze voor de stroomonderbreking stond ingesteld.

hint.en: This parameter (3) determines whether the `BASIC report` is send to the Lifeline when the load state changed. Default: activated
hint.nl: Deze parameter (3) bepaalt of het `BASIC report` wordt verstuurd naar de controller wanneer de toestand van de dimmer verandert. Standaard: ingeschakeld

hint.en: This parameter (6) determines the used MOSFET driving type. Default: Leading edge
hint.nl: Deze parameter (6) bepaalt de gebruikte MOSFET driving type. Standaard: Fase aansnijding

instruction.en:
Press and hold down both I and O buttons over 3 seconds.

If pairing fails reset the device by press and hold down both buttons I and O for over 10 seconds.

hint.en:
1. Send Command Class Device Reset Locally Notification V1 to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information when factory reset the remote control.
2. When remote control battery power value changes, send Command Class Battery Report V1 to associated devices of this group to report power value information.
3. Short press or press and hold down any button to send scene activation command to the associated devices of this group using Command Class Central Scene Notification V3

1. Short press / button of Group 2 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
2. Press and hold down / button of Group 2 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.
3. Short press Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Activation Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.
4. Press and hold down Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Conf Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.

1. Short press / button of Group 3 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
2. Press and hold down / button of Group 3 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.
3. Short press Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Activation Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.
4. Press and hold down Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Conf Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.

1. Short press / button of Group 4 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
2. Press and hold down / button of Group 4 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.
3. Short press Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Activation Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.
4. Press and hold down Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Conf Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.

1. Short press / button of Group 5 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
2. Press and hold down / button of Group 5 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.
3. Short press Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Activation Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.
4. Press and hold down Scene button S1/S2, direct control of associated devices using Scene Conf Set, Scene ID = 0x10 / 0x20.

instruction.en:
Press and hold down both buttons over 3 seconds.

If pairing fails reset the device by press and hold down both buttons for over 10 seconds.

hint.en:
1. Send Command Class Device Reset Locally Notification V1 to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information when factory reset the remote control.
2. When remote control battery power value changes, send Command Class Battery Report V1 to associated devices of this group to report power value information.
3. Short press or press and hold down any button to send scene activation command to the associated devices of this group using Command Class Central Scene Notification V3

Short press on/off button to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.

Press and hold down brightness button to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.

instruction.en:
Press and hold down both I and O buttons over 3 seconds.

If pairing is not started press and hold down both buttons I and O for over 10 seconds.

hint.en:
1. Send Command Class Device Reset Locally Notification V1 to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information when factory reset the remote control.
2. When remote control battery power value changes, send Command Class Battery Report V1 to associated devices of this group to report power value information.
3. Short press or press and hold down any button to send scene activation command to the associated devices of this group using Command Class Central Scene Notification V3

Short press I/O button of Group 2 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.
Press and hold down I/O button of Group 2 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.

Press and hold down I/O button of Group 3 to send light intensity increase/decrease command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Multilevel V4.

Press and hold down both I and O buttons over 3 seconds.

If pairing is not started press and hold down both buttons I and O for over 10 seconds.

hint.en:
1. Send Command Class Device Reset Locally Notification V1 to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information when factory reset the remote control.
2. When remote control battery power value changes, send Command Class Battery Report V1 to associated devices of this group to report power value information.
3. Short press or press and hold down any button to send scene activation command to the associated devices of this group using Command Class Central Scene Notification V3

Short press I/O button of Group 2 to send ON/OFF command to associated devices of this group using Command Class Basic Set V2.

instruction.en:
(Re)Power on the smart plug, it will be set into pair mode automatically. You can also press the action button on the smart plug 3 times.

If pairing fails reset the device by press and hold down action button for over 10 seconds.

hint.en:
1. Smart plug Factory Reset, send Command Class Device Reset Locally Notification CC to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information when factory reset the smart plug.

2. Smart plug overloads, send Command Class NOTIFICATION_REPORT CC to associated devices of this group to report overload information.

3. When smart plug state changes, send Command Class SWITCH_BINARY_REPORT CC to associated devices of this group to report state information.

4. METER_ REPORT

instruction.en:
Turn the device to OFF mode first, then press and hold UP and DOWN buttons at the same time for over 5 seconds to enter Settings Menu. Short press UP and DOWN button to select ADD item, then short press button F.

If pairing fails reset the device by select Reset item, then short press button F.
